channel.title: undefined - Dietrich Ayala
channel.description: Internet freedom, the web and Mozilla.

item.title: Wife on the Telly, Kicking Ass and Taking Names
item.description:
My wife Shauna just started a fellowship at the Northwest Constitutional Rights Center as an attorney. During her first week on the job, there was an anti-Bush protest in downtown Portland, that unfortunately turned violent when a group of protesters went off-route and were turned back by police, using pepper spray, rubber bullets and horses. Shauna was on one of the local news channels that night, giving the NWCRC's comment on what happened:

Watch video (6mb MPEG4)
item.dc:creator: Dietrich Ayala

item.title: Bookmarklet for Posting to Allconsuming.net from BarnesAndNoble.com
item.description:
Based on Phil Wilson's great bookmarklet for posting to AllConsuming.net from Amazon.com.

However, Amazon.com has a 41% rating from BuyBlue.org, whereas Barnes and Noble has a 100% rating!

To install, drag this link to your bookmarks toolbar: Consume Responsibly!Link
item.dc:creator: Dietrich Ayala

item.title: EPA Says Toxic Sludge is Good for Fish (via NWD)
item.description: "The Army Corps of Engineers' dumping of toxic sludge into the Potomac River protects fish by forcing them to flee the polluted area and escape fishermen, according to an internal Environmental Protection Agency document."Link
item.dc:creator: Dietrich Ayala
